short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for getting notified of price of a product

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Price Peek Extension helps you stay informed about the prices of your favorite products. Set target prices for items you wish to purchase and receive instant email notifications as soon as the prices drop below your specified targets.
